H0.text: what all did ben franklin invent. Lightning Rod

H1.text: what all did ben franklin invent. Postal System Improvements

H2.text: what all did ben franklin invent. Franklin Stove

H3.text: what all did ben franklin invent. Bifocals

A4.text: Benjamin Franklin independently developed and popularized his own lightning rod design, which became widely adopted across Europe and North America.

A5.text: Benjamin Franklin conceived the pointed lightning rod conductor (not grounded), also called a lightning attractor or Franklin rod, in 1749 as part of his groundbreaking exploration of electricity.
